short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Read reviews. Write reviews. Hide websites from Google search.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The G-Reviews Chrome extension helps you read and write reviews for websites on Google search results. You can also hide the websites that are not 
relevant to your search results, scams, or any other reasons. 

* Read reviews - G-Reviews helps you read reviews about websites on the Google search results page.   
* Write reviews - Share your experiences to help others make better choices
* Hide websites - Hide the websites that are not relevant from the Google search page.
